content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 43, "index": 16}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 63, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 18, "index": 31}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft a granite_slab, I need to place 3 granite in the crafting grid. I will start by moving the granite from slot 36 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 43, "index": 16}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 63, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 18, "index": 31}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}]
thought: I now need to move the second granite from slot 36 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 43, "index": 16}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 63, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 18, "index": 31}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: Now I need to move the last granite from slot 36 to slot 3.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 3 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: granite_slab
inventory=[{"type": "granite_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "granite", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "nether_bricks", "quantity": 19, "index": 13}, {"type": "chorus_plant", "quantity": 43, "index": 16}, {"type": "gold_ore", "quantity": 63, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 18, "index": 31}]
thought: Now I can craft the granite_slab by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
